channel.title: Need help with connections
channel.description: Before you say I need to port forward, I've done that and tested it. My 718 client + source works fine, but I want to use a 667 source. So when I go to connect using the client with 127.0.0.1 on my hosting computer, doesn't work, I try using my no-ip IP on a different computer, still doesn't work. I had this problem with 718 but I had to change the sub_revisions or something like that (I did it awhile ago) but I can't find out how to do it in 667. All help is appreciated :) No hate pls.

item.title: Need help with connections
item.dc:creator: @Mojas Mojas
item.description:
@Mojas wrote:

Before you say I need to port forward, I’ve done that and tested it. My 718 client + source works fine, but I want to use a 667 source. So when I go to connect using the client with 127.0.0.1 on my hosting computer, doesn’t work, I try using my no-ip IP on a different computer, still doesn’t work. I had this problem with 718 but I had to change the sub_revisions or something like that (I did it awhile ago) but I can’t find out how to do it in 667. All help is appreciated
No hate pls.

Read full topic
